comments.author: aandiarie.7195
comments.body:
Generally if you push “g” and you look at the list it should show if people are on and where they are. UNLESS they are set to invisible ( some people do that if they want some peace/quiet) also people may have someone blocked too.

A long time ago there was a guild bug for free to play accounts, but I think that’s over with.

comments.author: Reincarnated.1754
comments.body:
Tried a search but didn’t find an answer.

Has anything ben done to the Guild API to let us know who’s on line?

Also in game, is there any progress to give permissions to members other than the owner to use Guild authenticated API’s?

Tim
